request.description: Get a specific user by ID. Requires USERS:READ permission.
Update user information. Requires USERS:UPDATE permission.

query.description: Filter by type (IN, OUT, ADJUST_IN, ADJUST_OUT, TRANSFER_OUT, TRANSFER_IN)
Sort by field (type, status, createdAt, postedAt)

request.description: Obtener todos los movimientos de inventario. Puedes filtrar por productId, warehouseId, status, type, y rango de fechas.
Crear un nuevo movimiento de inventario
Post a movement (change status from DRAFT to POSTED). Requires INVENTORY:ENTRY permission.
Obtener todas las transferencias entre bodegas
Initiate a new transfer between warehouses. Requires INVENTORY:TRANSFER permission.
Get current stock levels with optional filters. Requires INVENTORY:READ permission.
Confirm a transfer (DRAFT -> IN_TRANSIT). Requires INVENTORY:TRANSFER permission.
Receive a transfer (IN_TRANSIT -> RECEIVED). Requires INVENTORY:TRANSFER permission.
Reject a transfer (IN_TRANSIT -> REJECTED). Requires INVENTORY:TRANSFER permission.
Cancel a transfer (DRAFT only). Requires INVENTORY:TRANSFER permission.

item.name: Sales
item.description: Endpoints for sales management

request.description: Create a new sale in DRAFT status
Get a list of sales with optional filters
Get a sale by its ID
Get all returns associated with a sale
Update a sale (only DRAFT status). Requires INVENTORY:ENTRY permission.
Confirm a sale and generate inventory movement. Requires INVENTORY:ENTRY permission.
Cancel a sale. Requires INVENTORY:ENTRY permission.
Add a line to a sale (only DRAFT status). Requires INVENTORY:ENTRY permission.
Remove a line from a sale (only DRAFT status). Requires INVENTORY:ENTRY permission.
Get the associated inventory movement for a confirmed sale. Requires INVENTORY:VIEW permission.

item.description: Endpoints for returns management

request.description: Create a new return in DRAFT status
Get a list of returns with optional filters
Get a return by its ID
Update a return (only DRAFT status)
Confirm a return and generate inventory movement
Cancel a return
Add a line to a return (only DRAFT status)
Remove a line from a return (only DRAFT status)

item.name: Organization
item.description: Endpoints for organization management

request.description: Create a new multi-tenant organization. Only super-admins can create organizations. Requires SYSTEM_ADMIN role.

item.name: Get Organization by ID or Slug

request.description: Get a specific organization by ID or slug. The endpoint accepts both organization ID (CUID format) and organization slug. Only super-admins can access organizations. Requires SYSTEM_ADMIN role.
Update an existing organization. Only super-admins can update organizations. All fields are optional. Requires SYSTEM_ADMIN role.

exec: pm.test('Response has updated organization data', function () {

View supplier returns report. Returns JSON data with supplier return metrics.

item.name: Import
item.description: Endpoints for bulk data import. Supports importing products, movements, warehouses, stock, and transfers from Excel/CSV files.

formdata.description: Excel or CSV file to preview
Import type: PRODUCTS, MOVEMENTS, WAREHOUSES, STOCK, TRANSFERS

request.description: Preview and validate import file without persisting. Returns validation results and preview of data to be imported.

formdata.description: Excel or CSV file to import
Import type: PRODUCTS, MOVEMENTS, WAREHOUSES, STOCK, TRANSFERS

request.description: Execute complete import process (validate + create + process) in one operation. Use this for quick imports.
Create a new import batch. Use this for multi-step imports where you want to validate and process separately.

formdata.description: Excel or CSV file to validate

request.description: Validate an import batch with uploaded file. Changes batch status to VALIDATED if successful.

variable.description: Import type: PRODUCTS, MOVEMENTS, WAREHOUSES, STOCK, TRANSFERS

request.description: Download import template for a specific type. Returns an Excel or CSV file with the required columns and example data.
Get error report for an import batch. Returns a file with details of all validation and processing errors.
